name: 2 Player Basketball Toss Pixel
description:
Take part in a basketball tournament! You and your friend can play in the final of basketball championship. 2 Player Basketball Toss Pixel – it's a real basketball simulator for 2 players. Hit the rival basket, return a ball, don't let your opponent bag a goal!

Share screen with your friend, choose your character.Tap the button to choose the angle and the power of your shoot. If you prefer playing alone, you can compete with real basketball stars.

2 Players Basketball Shoot Pixel game features:
• Real basketball tournament;
• Play with your friend or alone;
• Perfect reaction and accuracy training;
• Sport game simulator;
• Unique atmosphere of bouncy basketball match;
• Exciting graphics and sounds.

Toss a basketball ball – let's start our showdown! 2 Players Basketball Shoot Pixel – extremely addictive, extremely fun!
